item.title: OpenAI将开始在ChatGPT的免费和Go版本中测试广告
item.description: OpenAI周五表示，计划在其聊天机器人ChatGPT的免费版和Go版中开始测试广告功能。【原文：OpenAI said on Friday it plans to start testing ads in its chatbot ChatGPT's free and Go tiers.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称美国正探讨以委内瑞拉重质原油换取美国中质原油的计划，以补充战略储备
item.description: 据两名消息人士周五透露，美国能源部正探讨一项计划，拟用委内瑞拉重质原油交换美国中质酸性原油，以补充战略石油储备。【原文：The U.S. Department of Energy is exploring a plan to exchange heavy Venezuelan oil for U.S. medium, sour crude to fill up the Strategic Petroleum Reserve, two sources said on Friday.】

item.title: 西捷航空因乘客强烈反对将取消不可调节靠背的经济舱座椅
item.description: 西捷航空周五宣布，将在部分波音737客机上取消不可调节的经济舱座椅。此前社交媒体上涌现大量投诉和视频，显示旅客膝盖紧贴前排座椅。【原文：WestJet Airlines said on Friday it will scrap non-reclinable economy seating on certain Boeing 737 jets, following a slew of complaints and videos on social media showing travelers' knees pressed up against the seats ahead of them.】

item.title: 数据库管理公司ClickHouse在人工智能热潮中估值达150亿美元
item.description: 数据库管理公司ClickHouse在最新融资轮中估值达150亿美元，首席执行官亚伦·卡茨周五表示，投资者正对乘势而上的AI企业进行新一轮押注。【原文：Database management company ClickHouse was valued at $15 billion in its latest funding round , Chief Executive Aaron ​Katz said on Friday, as investors placed ‌a fresh bet on companies riding the AI boom.】

item.title: 美国称加拿大允许进口中国电动汽车的决定"存在问题"
item.description: 美国贸易代表杰米森·格里尔表示，加拿大政府决定以低关税率允许最多49,000辆中国电动汽车进口的做法"存在问题"，并称加拿大最终可能会为这一决定感到后悔。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said the Canadian government's decision to allow in up to 49,000 Chinese electric vehicles at a low tariff rate is "problematic" and that Canada may come to regret the decision.】

item.title: 最高法院计划于1月20日作出裁决，特朗普关税案仍悬而未决
item.description: 美国最高法院预计将于1月20日作出下一批裁决，目前仍有若干重大案件悬而未决，包括对特朗普总统实施全球性关税的合法性问题。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court is expected to issue its next rulings on January 20 as several major cases remain pending including the legality of President Donald Trump's sweeping global tariffs.】

item.title: 鲍曼称美联储应准备再次降息以应对就业市场风险
item.description: 美联储负责监管事务的副主席米歇尔·鲍曼周五表示，脆弱的就业市场可能迅速恶化，这意味着美国央行应随时准备在必要时再次降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chair for Supervision Michelle Bowman said on ​Friday a fragile job market that could weaken quickly means the U.S. central bank should stand ready to cut interest ‌rates again if needed.】

item.title: 道琼斯检测器显示，埃隆·马斯克的X平台全球数万用户无法访问
item.description: 据故障追踪网站Downdetector.com显示，周五全球数万用户遭遇X平台服务中断。【原文：X was down for tens of thousands of users worldwide on Friday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 顾问称特朗普住房计划将允许动用401(k)资金支付首付
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文·哈塞特周五表示，特朗普政府计划允许投资者动用部分退休金支付购房首付，并称更多细节将于下周公布。【原文：The Trump administration plans to allow investors to use some of their retirement funds to make a down payment on a ​house, White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said on Friday, adding that ‌more details will be released next week.】

item.title: 特朗普告诉哈塞特，他可能希望留他在白宫任职。
item.description: 周五，唐纳德·特朗普总统在白宫活动中称赞了经济顾问凯文·哈塞特，并表示可能希望他继续担任现职。目前总统正在考虑下一任美联储主席的提名人选。【原文：President Donald Trump on Friday praised economic adviser Kevin Hassett at a White House event and said he may want to keep him in his current role, as the president considers his nominee for the next Federal Reserve chair.】

item.title: 美国12月制造业产出意外增长
item.description: 美国12月工厂产量意外增长，主要金属产量激增抵消了汽车装配厂的下滑，但受进口关税挑战影响，第四季度整体活动出现收缩。【原文：U.S. factory production unexpectedly increased in December amid a surge in primary metals output that offset a decline at motor vehicle assembly ​plants, but activity contracted in the fourth quarter against the ‌backdrop of challenges from import tariffs.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心指数1月回落，购房负担能力受限
item.description: 美国住房建筑商信心指数1月份恶化，一项周五公布的调查显示，购房负担能力担忧使潜在买家望而却步，而成本上升则阻碍了建筑活动。【原文：U.S. homebuilder sentiment deteriorated in January as affordability worries sidelined potential buyers and rising costs hampered construction activity, a survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: ISS建议股东批准金佰利·克拉克公司拟议的肯维尤交易
item.description: 机构股东服务公司周五建议股东批准金佰利·克拉克公司收购泰诺制造商健威公司的计划，称此次合并有望改善财务指标。【原文：Institutional Shareholder Services on ​Friday recommended that ‌shareholders approve plans by Kleenex maker Kimberly-Clark ‌to buy Tylenol maker ​Kenvue, saying a tie-up ‍could improve financial metrics.】

item.title: 期权到期或为美股波动率上升扫清道路
item.description: 期权市场专家指出，周五的月度期权到期日可能使美国股市在未来几天面临更大涨跌幅，或将推动市场波动率从历史低位回升。【原文：Friday's monthly options expiration is likely to exposeU.S. stocks to greater swings in either direction in coming days, potentially boosting market volatility from historically low levels, according to options market experts.】

item.title: 沃尔玛任命内部人士大卫·古吉纳为美国首席执行官，领导层迎来人事变动
item.description: 沃尔玛周五任命资深高管大卫·古吉纳执掌美国业务部门，接替约翰·弗纳的职位。弗纳将出任这家零售巨头的首席执行官。【原文：Walmart on Friday named long-time executive ​David Guggina to head its U.S. division, succeeding ‌John Furner, who would take over as the chief executive officer of the retail behemoth.】

item.title: 交易撮合者预计2026年零售业并购与IPO将增多，因关税因素去年抑制了并购活动
item.description: 交易撮合者预测，今年零售商和消费品公司的并购及首次公开募股活动将有所回升。此前，美国对进口商品征收的惩罚性关税导致该行业在2025年上半年陷入停滞。【原文：Dealmakers predict an uptick in mergers and IPOs for retailers and consumer goods companies this year after punishing tariffs on imports to the U.S. had sidelined activity in the industry for the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 白宫顾问哈塞特淡化对美联储主席鲍威尔的调查
item.description: 白宫顾问凯文·哈塞特周五淡化了针对美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的联邦刑事调查，称他预计"此事不会有任何结果"。【原文：White House adviser Kevin Hassett played down the federal criminal investigation into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Friday, saying he expected there would be "nothing to see here".】

item.title: 摩根大通组建新顾问团队，借势私募市场繁荣期
item.description: 摩根大通周五宣布组建新的顾问团队，协助企业及发起人从私募市场筹集资金。作为美国最大贷款机构，该行正寻求在炙手可热的另类资产领域深化布局。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has formed a new advisory team to help companies and sponsors raise money from private markets, it said on Friday, as the largest U.S. lender looks to deepen its presence in the red-hot alternative asset class.】

item.title: 特斯拉在美国全自动驾驶交通违规调查中获准延期五周
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构已批准特斯拉延长五周时间，以回应针对其车辆在开启马斯克领导的公司全自动驾驶系统时是否违反交通法规的调查。【原文：U.S. auto safety regulators have granted Tesla a five-week extension to respond to an investigation into whether its vehicles violated traffic laws while the Elon Musk-led company's Full Self-Driving system was engaged.】

item.title: 德国汽车业称重返苏伊士运河前仍有疑问
item.description: 德国汽车工业协会VDA周五表示，德国汽车行业在恢复经苏伊士运河运输前仍面临诸多悬而未决的问题，尤其是保险问题。【原文：The German automotive industry is still seeing open questions, particularly insurance issues, before resuming transports through the Suez Canal, its business association VDA said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国主导的跨境数字货币平台用户激增
item.description: 最新报告显示，中国主导的新型数字货币平台交易额已飙升至550亿美元以上，这再次表明，建立替代美元主导的全球支付体系的努力正在取得进展。【原文：Transactions on a new China-led digital currency platform have surged to over $55 billion, a new report shows, the latest sign that efforts to build alternatives to dollar-dependent global payment systems are ​gaining traction.】

item.title: 诺沃制药的Wegovy药丸上市首日即追踪到3,071份处方
item.description: 诺和诺德的减肥药Wegovy上市后前四天在美国开出3071张处方，IQVIA数据周五披露的数据显示。投资者正密切关注该公司能否在竞争激烈的减肥药市场中，凭借先发优势压制竞争对手礼来公司。【原文：Novo Nordisk's Wegovy pill hit 3,071 U.S. prescriptions in the first four days after its launch, IQVIA data shared by analysts on Friday showed, as investors closely watch to see if the firm can ram home its first-mover advantage against rival Eli Lilly in a competitive weight-loss market.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称戴安娜航运计划发起Genco代理权争夺战，拟提名6名董事
item.description: 知情人士透露，全球航运公司戴安娜航运计划发起代理权争夺战，以取代竞争对手Genco航运贸易公司现有的六名董事。此前该公司董事会刚于数日前否决了戴安娜的收购要约。【原文：Global shipping company Diana Shipping plans to launch a proxy fight to replace rival Genco Shipping & Trading's six current directors, making its decision just days after the board rejected Diana's takeover offer, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 卢克石油的国际资产与潜在买家
item.description: 美国财政部已将受制裁的俄罗斯石油公司卢克石油就出售其大部分国际资产进行谈判的截止日期延长至2月28日。【原文：The U.S. Treasury has extended the deadline for sanctioned Russian oil firm Lukoil to negotiate the sale of the bulk of its international assets until February 28.】

item.title: 马赛克公司警告称北美化肥需求将在第四季度下滑
item.description: 马赛克公司周五警告称，北美化肥需求在第四季度出现异常急剧下滑，已对其销售额和现金流造成压力，导致该公司股价在盘前交易中下跌逾6%。【原文：Mosaic warned on Friday that an unusually steep drop in ​North American fertilizer demand during the fourth quarter ‌has weighed on its sales and cash flow, sending the company's shares declining more than 6% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 星链竞争对手欧卫通信与欧洲MaiaSpace公司达成协议，将共同发射卫星
item.description: 欧洲卫星运营商欧卫通信周五宣布，已与法国太空初创企业MaiaSpace签署协议，未来将由后者负责其低地球轨道（LEO）卫星的发射任务。此举对欧洲而言具有重大战略意义，助力其追赶美国竞争对手SpaceX。【原文：European satellite operator Eutelsat said on Friday it had signed a deal with French space startup MaiaSpace for the future launches of its low Earth orbit (LEO) satellites, in a major strategic boost for Europe as it seeks to catch up with U.S. rival SpaceX.】

item.title: Netflix财报料将因华纳兄弟交易问题而退居次席
item.description: 网飞计划通过收购华纳兄弟加速营收增长，这一战略将在周二该公司公布第四季度财报时成为焦点。这家流媒体先驱正与派拉蒙争夺好莱坞最受追捧的制片厂之一。【原文：Netflix's plans to accelerate revenue growth by buying Warner Bros will be in focus on Tuesday when it reports fourth-quarter results, as the streaming pioneer battles Paramount for one of the most prized studios in Hollywood.】

item.title: 诺和诺德的Wegovy减肥药在与礼来公司的减肥药竞争中取得"令人鼓舞"的开局
item.description: 诺和诺德的减肥药Wegovy本月上市后开局"令人鼓舞"，分析师周五援引美国早期处方数据称，市场正密切关注该药与美国竞争对手礼来公司的竞争态势。【原文：Novo Nordisk's Wegovy weight-loss pill has made an "encouraging" start after its launch this month, ‌analysts said on Friday citing early U.S. prescription data, with the market watching closely its battle with U.S. rival Eli Lilly .】

item.title: 欧盟与南共市贸易协定风波后续将如何发展？
item.description: 欧盟高层官员将于周六前往巴拉圭，与南美国家联盟南方共同市场签署自由贸易协定。历经25年谈判，这项协定将为欧盟缔结史上最大规模贸易协定铺平道路。【原文：Top EU officials will travel to Paraguay on Saturday to sign a free trade agreement with South American bloc Mercosur, paving the way for the European Union's largest ever trade accord after 25 years of negotiations.】

item.title: 印度塔塔科技季度利润暴跌96%，因一次性劳动法合规费用
item.description: 工程研发公司塔塔科技周四公布，其第三季度利润暴跌96%，主要受印度新劳动法规相关的一次性费用拖累，创下该公司2023年上市以来最大跌幅。【原文：Engineering research and development (ER&D) firm Tata Technologies reported a 96% drop in third-quarter profit on Thursday, hurt primarily by a one-time charge tied to India's new labour codes, their largest such drop since the company's 2023 market debut.】
